OCD.name: Twitter Reader
OCD.description: This algorithm will read the tweets from Twitter for the given tag and user IDs. The output result is in table format.

AD.name: Twitter User ID
AD.description: Please provide the column that contains the Twitter user IDs

AD.name: Tag
AD.description: Leave it empty if you want to download all tweets. Else, provide the tag to be searched.

AD.name: Consumer key
AD.description: Please provide the Consumer key provided by your Twitter application

AD.name: Consumer Secret
AD.description: Please provide the Consumer secret provided by your Twitter application

AD.name: Access Token
AD.description: Please provide the Access key provided by your Twitter application

AD.name: Access Secret
AD.description: Please provide the Access key provided by your Twitter application
